name: FlowState
signal_source: Users complain: 'Focus apps don't work because they ignore my energy levels' and 'I'm forced to work when my brain isn't ready'
description: Energy-aware focus sessions that adapt timing and intensity based on user's natural energy patterns and circadian rhythms
target_user: Remote workers and creatives who struggle with traditional time-based productivity methods
pain_point_evidence: Energy management research shows timing focus sessions with natural energy peaks increases effectiveness by 40%; users report traditional pomodoro timers ignore their biological rhythms
core_loop: Track energy levels and focus quality
differentiation: First focus app that prioritizes energy optimization over rigid time blocks; adapts to user's natural rhythms
subscription_fit: Continuous learning and personalized energy insights create ongoing value for sustained performance

pricing.trial_strategy: 14-day trial to establish baseline energy patterns
